text:
<@U050B0DMAE7> can you tell me more what you would like that company workflow to do so I learn more about the requirement?

Feel free to upvote (and comment if you like) <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Add-behavioral-events-Events-API-to-company-timeline-and-company/idi-p/382020|this ideas forum post >to raise more awareness of this lacking feature.

Hello <@U05H3C4GDMX>, I wanna be able to use the data contained into the timeline events inside my workflow to update properties, send email based on data, create task etc.. We can have many use cases

I will definitely take this under advice for future developments, thanks for sharing.

Depending on your exact use case (especially the enrolment criteria), you might be able to use the contacts object as an alternative.
Has anyone triggered a custom object workflow on a custom behavioral event ?

per this documentation
```Domain: this setting only applies if you're using a customized quote template. The domain is set by the quote template you selected.```

Hi I am working on some custom workflow actions. I am trying delete a custom workflow action and I can't because it is being used by some portal but I cannot work out which one it is. In the api response it says to 'contact HubSpot developer support' where do I go to do this.
I meant to mention also that this is only a test app and so I know that it is not being used by anyone that wants it. I just need it deleted.
